players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "This is terrible! Bob's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious yet?"
You: "I'm shocked about Bob's death. Let's all share if we have any suspicions."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found out they are the mafioso. We should vote for them to protect the town."
You: "I believe Diana's claim about Charlie. We should vote for them to keep the town safe."
Charlie: "Diana, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't prove it. Why should we believe you're the detective and not the mafia trying to frame me?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
